RegisterMethods - Class in melting.configuration
This class registers all the methods and models implemented by Melting.

ArrayList registerPatternModels : contains the option names to choose a pattern model.
removeDanglingEnds(String) - Static method in class melting.sequences.NucleotidSequences
removes the dangling ends and terminal gaps in the String sequence.
removeHydroxyA(String, String) - Static method in class melting.sequences.NucleotidSequences
To convert the hydroxyadenine (A*) into an adenine (A) in the acid1 String and acid2 String.
removeTerminalUnpairedNucleotides() - Method in class melting.sequences.NucleotidSequences

RNADefaultOptions - Variable in class melting.configuration.OptionManagement
HashMap RNADefaultOptions : contains the default options if the type of hybridization is "rnarna"
rnaEquivalent - Variable in class melting.sequences.NucleotidSequences
NucleotidSequences rnaEquivalent : the NucleotidSequences object which represents this NucleotidSequences object with RNA sequences This object is initialised when a model for RNA sequences is selected by the user and the hybridisation type is dnadna
runMelting(String[], OptionManagement) - Static method in class melting.Main
compute the entropy, enthalpy and the melting temperature and display the results.
